summary: Frontend-only testing of Operation Eden tactical platform. Tested 11 pages for 3D icons, dark tactical theme, page-enter animations, and visual elements. All requested features implemented correctly EXCEPT for one broken image: Documents/Docs navigation icon (403 error from remote URL).

ui_bugs.issue: Documents header 3D icon broken - image returns 403 Forbidden
Docs navigation icon broken - same 403 error

action_items: Fix NAV_ICONS.documents URL in /app/frontend/src/assets/badges.js - the URL returns 403 Forbidden. Either use a working URL or fallback to a local icon like '/icons/documents.png'
critical_code_review_comments: All pages use dark tactical theme consistently (zinc-950 backgrounds)
page-enter animation class correctly applied to Dashboard, Documents, ClaimsList, Recon, BattlePass, Settings, MyCard, EveAI pages
shadow-tactical and hover-lift-sm classes properly applied to Dashboard cards (12 shadow-tactical, 13 hover-lift-sm elements)
Sidebar navigation now uses 3D image icons (img tags) instead of lucide-react SVG icons
17/18 sidebar icons load correctly - only Documents icon is broken
Register page logo loads correctly from /icons/app_logo.png

success_rate.frontend: 94% - All features pass except Documents icon (1 broken image out of 18 sidebar icons)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Documents 3D icon (NAV_ICONS.documents) URL is broken. All other icons work. The app has consistent tactical dark theme across all pages.
